pkgmetadata.longdescription: Intraclass Correlations for Quantifying Inter-Rater Reliability // Calculates various intraclass correlation coefficients used to quantify inter-rater and intra-rater reliability. The assumption here is that the raters produced quantitative ratings. Most of the statistical procedures implemented in this package are described in details in Gwet, K.L. (2014, ISBN:978-0970806284): "Handbook of Inter-Rater Reliability," 4th edition, Advanced Analytics, LLC.
